name: Shop n' Zombies
description:
Shop n' Zombies

Welcome to the grocery store.

I reckon you’ve been here once or twice in your life.  

Oh no, we’re in the middle of a zombie apocalypse! 

Double oh no! We ran out of supplies. 

Help our brave survivor to gather her supplies and maybe take out some zombies while we’re there. Good luck and don’t die! 

Controls:
  • W - UP
  • A - Left
  • S - Right
  • D - Down
Credits:

Programmers:

  • Lousie B
  • Pablo J
  • Niels H

Artists:

  • Trang N
  • Isabella J
  • Wessel M

This game was created in 3 days for International Educations Game Jam.
